name: Drained
description:
You are a newly employed sewer inspector. You were called to inspect one of the pipe in the sewer system, but a series of letters made by the previous the sewer inspectors led you an inquisitive part of the sewer system.

Note:

  • Make sure you pick up the keys, otherwise, you can't proceed. (You need to go back and get the key)
  • There are 2 endings
